text: Beaumetz-lès-Loges is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts- de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A farming village located 7 miles (11 km) southwest of Arras at the junction of the N25 with the D7 road. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of St. Michel, dating from the fifteenth century. * Vestiges of an old castle. * A World War I cemetery. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file ==External links== * The cemetery at Beaumetz Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Beaumetz-lès-Loges
